hobbies.title: Connecting With People
hobbies.descr: Interacting and socialising with people across the world. Exploring and learning more about individuals that come from different origins

hobbies.title: Reading
hobbies.descr: As Humans I believe that we have an innate thirst for knowledge, an d I personally find that satiating this desire through reading is the best option for me

hobbies.title: Long Lonely Walks
hobbies.descr: As much as  love people I do occasionally require some time to do sel-introspection. This helps me sort out my emotions and unclutter my mind.

hobbies.title: Gaming
hobbies.descr: Just like the next individual I really do enjoy playing a variety of video-games, majority being competitive multiplayer games. There's nothing better than testing your skills against someone whose equally or more skilled that you.

hobbies.title: Hard Coding
hobbies.descr: Great way to stimulate my mind and access a level of creativity that's generally not accessible to me in my everyday life. It does not bring me joy, it bring me satisfaction.
